item.title: Claire’s Skips Rent Payments, Moving Closer to Bankruptcy Filing
item.description: Claire’s Stores Inc. is inching closer to filing for Chapter 11 bankruptcy as the teen accessory chain elected to miss June and July rent payments on some stores, according to people familiar with the
